Name: Verses from "The Mountain Wreath"
Notes: This harmonically extremely colorful and dynamically contrasting piece is based on verses by the Serbian national poet Petar Petrovic Njegoš, who lived in the 19th century.
Long Description: This harmonically extremely colorful and dynamically contrasting piece is based on verses by the Serbian national poet Petar Petrovic Njegoš, who lived in the 19th century. Colourful sounds and contrasting dynamics attract the listener spontaneously.
Short Description: A piece for baritone and piano based on verses by the Serbian national poet Petar Petrovic Njegoš.
